text: @PresidencyZA @CyrilRamaphosa Sir.  After the little investigation I made on social research. I learnt that the South African covid-19 rules does not effect in soshanguve as I was told people are moving around.  This has been making the number of the cases to add more.  Pls deploy more cops and soldiers.
